values: 保持；继续（做某事）；维持；坚持；保存；保有；保护；保留；拥有；放；存放；贮存；保持不坏；处于；使处于；记；记下；记录；记载；遵守；履行；遵循；保守（秘密）；实现；兑现；维护；养；保养；养活；抚养开设；管理（商店或餐馆）；经营；监护；看守；监禁；关押；使耽搁
保持；维护；保养；饲养；监护；看管；控制；生活必需品；生计；生活费用；城堡主塔；城堡主楼

pos_mean_info_list.mean: 保持；维持；保管（keep的过去式和过去分词）
监护人；饲养员；看守人；管理人

word_mean_info__list.difference: 一般指保存自然资源，保全人的精力、力量等。
正式用词，指为了将来的用途或其他用途而保存、保留。
指扣住不放，暗示有阻碍。
主要指为防止损害、变质等而保存。
最常用词，指长时间牢固地保持或保存。
最常用词，可指任何情况下的具有，无论是物质的或精神的。
指拥有并保持财产及持有见解等，暗示不让别人拿走或占有。
较正式，指拥有或占有并能加以控制与支配，强调其归属；也指具有某种品质、才能、特点或性能等。
不及本组的possess正式，多指所属关系，强调所有权，不管所属物是否在物主手中。
指享有某种权利或长处，带有欣赏或喜爱的情感。
指长时间地保有，保存某物，防止别人占去，强调安全和感情上的依附。

word_group.brief_definition: 追踪（或失去）关于…的消息；一直了解
与…齐步前进；与…并驾齐驱
避免做某事；使某人避免做某事
熟悉, 跟上(消息、形势等)
保持, 坚持；跟上；承诺按期付款或做
不让…接近；避免侵占；没有发生, 没有出现；避免吃、喝或吸烟；避开
保持跟踪, 注意动向, 保持追踪

bilingual.target: 我们必须保持营地清洁。

bilingual.source: You need to keep your room tidy.
We try to keep quiet at night.
bilingual.target: 我们晚上尽量保持安静。

list.abstract: keep是北京卡路里科技有限公司于2015年2月推出的一款运动社交软件，包含iOS版和Android版。 该软件涵盖健身、跑步、商城、饮食指导、运动直播等综合性功能，提供健身教学、跑步、骑行、交友及健身饮食指导、装备购买等一站式运动解决方案。 2017年，该软件获《中国经营报》评选的最佳发展潜力奖。2022年5月，入选2021年国家体育产业基地名单。2023年8月25日，Keep发布2023半年报。财报显示，公司在报告期内总收入9.85亿元，按照非国际财务报告准则调整后净亏损2.23亿元，较去年同期的净亏损3.17亿元大幅收窄。

Keep（英[kiːp]，美[kiːp]），英语单词。作动词时，释义为拥有；占有；保有。作名词时，释义为生活必需物品；照管；控制。短语搭配为keep in mind（记住）。例句为“It can help keep their blood pressure normal and improve blood circulation.（这有助于他们血压正常，也能促进血液循环。）” keep的过去分词为kept。其及物动词近义词有retain、operate、respect，不及物动词近义词有remain、to hold，名词性近义词有conservation、maintenance、livelihood；反义词有discontinue、lose、break。

yingyinNormal.en: Let's keep this our little secret.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这事就当是我们俩的小秘密。

yingyinNormal.en: So keep an open mind.
yingyinNormal.zh: 所以保持开放的心态。

yingyinNormal.en: It's quite windy. Let's play a game to keep warm.
yingyinNormal.zh: 风真大。我们来玩个游戏保持温暖吧。

yingyinNormal.en: Did you keep in contact? Christmas cards and such.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你们还保持联系了吗？圣诞贺卡什么的。

yingyinNormal.en: Well, I guess we should be going now. Promise me you'll keep in touch.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们该走了。答应我你们会保持连络。

yingyinNormal.en: And I hope that wherever you are, you get to keep being Riley.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我希望无论你身在何方，都能继续保持自我。

yingyinNormal.en: To play basketball, you need to train hard and keep fit. Are you fit, Daddy Coach? Yes, I'm super fit.
yingyinNormal.zh: 想要打好篮球你们要努力练习还要保持体型。你体型保持的好吗，教练爸爸？当然，我的体型相当不错。

yingyinNormal.en: It doesn't matter. Look, I promise from now on I will keep my distance from you.
yingyinNormal.zh: 没关系，我保证从今以后我会跟你保持距离。

yingyinNormal.en: You what? Keep your distance. Stay at least three feet away from the glass, and all that.
yingyinNormal.zh: 什么？保持距离站在至少一米开外什么的。

yingyinNormal.en: Measures had to be taken to keep their feet the perfect size. Three inches long.
yingyinNormal.zh: 必须采取一定措施才能让脚的尺寸保持完美，三寸之长。

yingyinNormal.en: To keep the power on, we rely on what's been called the largest and most complex machine in the world.
yingyinNormal.zh: 要保持供电，我们依赖一种大而复杂的机器。

yingyinNormal.en: Because you get to keep something, because it's very valuable, which is social relationships.
yingyinNormal.zh: 因为你要保持住，因为它很珍贵，这就是社会关系。

yingyinNormal.en: Mostly we're terrified of them, sir. So we try to keep our distance.
yingyinNormal.zh: 大部分时间我们都很害怕她们，老师。所以我们始终和她们保持距离。

yingyinNormal.en: Benji, we are trying to keep a low profile. You want drama, go to the opera.
yingyinNormal.zh: 班吉，我们都要努力保持低调，你想来点刺激的剧情，去看歌剧吧。

yingyinNormal.en: Objection. Come on up. That was a little bit unsubtle. Need to keep the jury awake.
yingyinNormal.zh: 反对。上来吧。刚刚有点咄咄逼人啊。我得让陪审团保持清醒。

yingyinNormal.en: Collingwood supervises crews in this area, driving hours each day to keep the cable coming.
yingyinNormal.zh: 科林伍德监督这个地区的人员，每天工作数小时保持光纤通畅。

yingyinNormal.en: I challenged myself to keep an open mind. And my decision is: I will not run for president.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我让自己尽量保持开放的态度，而我的决定是我将不参选下任总统。

yingyinNormal.en: You are to work as a team. You will all make this bunk room your home. You will keep your home clean!
yingyinNormal.zh: 你们会组成一个团队，这间船舱就是你们的家，给我保持干净。

yingyinNormal.en: Chandler, will you just come in already? Oh no, thank you, I prefer to keep a safe distance from all this merriment.
yingyinNormal.zh: 钱德，你今晚会来吗？不，我喜欢和欢乐保持安全距离。

yingyinNormal.en: The rifle is the first weapon you learn how to use, because it lets you keep your distance from the client.
yingyinNormal.zh: 来复枪是你要学习的第一件武器，因为它能让你和目标保持距离。

exam_freq_info.chinese: (keep from)隐瞒; 阻止; 抑制
(keep in mind)牢记; 放在心上

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 置身...之外；把...挡在...外；躲开
继续向某人提供(需要或想要的东西)

examination_example.sentence: So they feel a responsibility to you to <highlight>keep</highlight> that relationship going.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 所以他们觉得你有责任保持这种关系。

examination_example.sentence: Enjoy the beauty of the world around and <highlight>keep</highlight> the eyes open to see the possibilities before you.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 欣赏周围世界的美丽，睁大眼睛，看看你面前的各种可能性。

examination_example.sentence: This <highlight>keeps</highlight> fees high and innovation slow.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这使得费用居高不下，创新缓慢。

sense_info_list.zh: (keep from)隐瞒; 阻止; 抑制

examination_example.sentence: What might have <highlight>kept</highlight> the Victorians from smiling for pictures in the 1890s?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 是什么让维多利亚时代的人在19世纪90年代的照片中无法微笑呢?

examination_example.sentence: These lessons are very important; they're how we grow, and how we <highlight>keep</highlight> from making that same mistake again.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这些教训非常重要；它们是我们成长的方式，也是我们避免再次犯同样错误的方式。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Keep</highlight> students from being unrealistic
examination_example.sentence_trans: 让学生不要不切实际

sense_info_list.zh: (keep in mind)牢记; 放在心上

examination_example.sentence: However, even though it's common, it's important to <highlight>keep</highlight> in mind that in a single moment of fatigue.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 尽管这很常见，但重要的是在疲劳的一瞬间也要记住。

examination_example.sentence: Try to <highlight>keep</highlight> in mind that almost everyone respects and wants to help you if you are trying to make a good change in your life.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 要记住，如果你想在生活中做出一个好的改变，几乎每个人都会尊重你，想要帮助你。

examination_example.sentence: But as the Nuclear Regulatory Commission (NRC) reviews the company's application, it should <highlight>keep</highlight> in mind what promises from Entergy are worth.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但是，当美国核管理委员会（NRC）审查该公司的申请时，应该记住Entergy的承诺值多少钱。

examination_example.sentence: But <highlight>keeping</highlight> sensitive information on these devices is increasingly a requirement of normal life.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但在这些设备上保存敏感信息逐渐成为日常生活中必做的事。

examination_example.sentence: But had Entergy <highlight>kept</highlight> its word, that debate would be beside the point.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但如果Entergy信守诺言，这场争论就无关紧要了。

examination_example.sentence: Sit down to read and the flywheel of work-related thoughts <highlight>keeps</highlight> spinning.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 坐下来阅读，而与工作相关的想法却像飞轮一样转个不停。

examination_example.sentence: Monarchs are <highlight>kept</highlight> as heads of state in Europe mostly owing to their undoubted and respectable status.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在欧洲，君主之所以被保留为国家元首，主要是因为他们无可置疑的受人尊敬的地位。

sense_info_list.en: to know sth and not tell it to anyone
the strong main tower of a castle

word_usage.usage: keep up with sb.是与某人保持联系；keep up with sth.是熟悉、了解（消息、形势）等；keep sb.up则是使某人熬夜、不睡觉；keep sth.up是指使某物保持（高水平）；沿用某事物；保养维护。

表示“继续”
keep指继续做之前所做的某事或重复做同一件事。
continue指持续而不停止，也可指中断后又继续下去。
go on指不停顿地继续下去。
resume指中断后继续进行。

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 保持跟踪；注意动向；保持追踪

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 管理人；看管者；耐贮藏的食物；值得保留的东西；固定物；保护物；四分卫护球推进打法；监护人；看护人

word_family.mean: v. 拥有；占有；保有；继续处于某情形；保持；抚养；赡养；养活；承兑；兑现；实现；履行；记；定期

examination_example.sentence: It should be <highlight>kept</highlight> private.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 应该是保密的。

examination_example.sentence: The James Dean film is a way to <highlight>keep</highlight> the actor's image relevant for younger generations.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 詹姆斯·迪恩的电影是保持演员形象与年轻一代相关的一种方式。

examination_example.sentence: The technology's ability to effectively <highlight>keep</highlight> celebrities alive beyond the grave is raising questions about public legacies and image rights.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这项技术能够有效地让名人死后继续活着，这引发了关于公共遗产和肖像权的问题。

sense_info_list.en: continue doing something； do something repeatedly

examination_example.sentence: And of course, managers shouldn't <highlight>keep</highlight> resending emails.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当然，经理们不应该一直不停发送邮件。

examination_example.sentence: He <highlight>kept</highlight> looking for the best place to stay.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他一直在寻找最好的住处。

examination_example.sentence: They <highlight>keep</highlight> dividing throughout one's life.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们一辈子都在分开。

word_usage.usage: 由keep构成的常用习语一般不用于进行体。

keep from 表示“避免，使不做某事”，主要用于否定句或疑问句。
Nothing can keep me from helping her.
没有什么能阻止我帮助她。

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 一般指保存自然资源, 保全人的精力、力量等。
最常用词, 指长时间牢固地保持或保存。

exam_freq_info.chinese: (keep up with)跟上; 并驾齐驱

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 追踪(或失去)关于...的消息；一直了解
保密；保守秘密；保守机密

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: If your definition of boredom is being quiet, mindful, and reflective, <highlight>keep</highlight> it up.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果你对无聊的定义是安静、专注和沉思，那就坚持下去。

examination_example.sentence: It was difficult to <highlight>keep</highlight> a job for long.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 很难长时间保住一份工作。

examination_example.sentence: They usually <highlight>keep</highlight> their eating habits a secret.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们通常对自己的饮食习惯保密。

sense_info_list.en: continue doing something; do something repeatedly

examination_example.sentence: It is not to the best interest of taxpayers to <highlight>keep</highlight> giving money to narrow winners.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 不断地把钱捐给狭隘的赢家，不符合纳税人的最大利益。

examination_example.sentence: What does the man say about people who <highlight>keep</highlight> changing their jobs?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 关于不断换工作的人，男士说了什么?

examination_example.sentence: Inability to <highlight>keep</highlight> turning out novel products.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 无法不断推出新产品。

examination_example.sentence: It gives 5,000 yen to employees who <highlight>keep</highlight> pet cats.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 养宠物猫的员工可以得到5000日元的奖励。

examination_example.sentence: Companies <highlight>keep</highlight> large volumes of records because they don't trust their suppliers, their contractors or their costumers.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 公司保存大量的记录，因为他们不信任供应商、承包商或客户。

sense_info_list.zh: (keep up with)跟上; 并驾齐驱

examination_example.sentence: They feel pressured to <highlight>keep</highlight> up with female colleagues.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 要跟上女同事，他们感到有压力。

word_usage.usage:
keep from 表示“避免，使不做某事”，主要用于否定句或疑问句。
Nothing can keep me from helping her.
没有什么能阻止我帮助她。
由keep构成的常用习语一般不用于进行体。

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 一般指保存自然资源，保全人的精力、力量等。
最常用词，指长时间牢固地保持或保存。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 保存; 保持; 留住

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 管理人；看管者；耐贮藏的食物；值得保留的东西；固定物；保护物；四分卫护球推进打法；监护人；看护人

word_family.mean: v. 拥有；占有；保有；继续处于某情形；保持；抚养；赡养；养活；承兑；兑现；实现；履行；记；定期

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 追踪(或失去)关于…的消息；一直了解
避免做某事；使某人避免做某事
与…齐步前进；与…并驾齐驱
不让…接近；避免侵占；没有发生；没有出现；避免吃、喝或吸烟；避开
保持；坚持；跟上；承诺按期付款或做
离开；避开；使离开；使避开
遵守；履行；不离开；留在；切题

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Keep</highlight> the room cool rather than warm to avoid feeling sleepy.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 保持房间凉爽而不是温暖，以免感到困倦。

examination_example.sentence: Always <highlight>keep</highlight> a pencil and paper beside you.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 随身携带一支铅笔和一张纸。

examination_example.sentence: In the lab, <highlight>keeping</highlight> things clean and organized can help provide a safer environment.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在实验室里，保持清洁和有序有助于提供更安全的环境。

sense_info_list.zh: 保存; 保持; 留住

examination_example.sentence: They <highlight>keep</highlight> using landline phones.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们一直在使用固定电话。

examination_example.sentence: It should <highlight>keep</highlight> pace with the procedure.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它应该与程序保持同步。

examination_example.sentence: I never worried about my son while I was away because my mother <highlight>kept</highlight> an eye on him.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我不在的时候从不担心儿子，因为我妈妈一直在看着他。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Keep</highlight> track of your efforts and write down how you feel.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 记录你的努力，写下你的感受。

examination_example.sentence: I expect you to do all the experiments and <highlight>keep</highlight> the results in your lab notebook.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我希望你做所有的实验，并把结果记在你的实验笔记本上。

examination_example.sentence: Begin <highlight>keeping</highlight> track of the time, and try to make dinner last at least 30 minutes.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 开始记录时间，尽量让晚餐至少持续30分钟。

examination_example.sentence: Jones'idea has been fully realized -- the benches help break down the invisible social barrier that <highlight>keeps</highlight> people from saying hello.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 琼斯的想法已经完全实现了——这些长椅有助于打破人们不打招呼的无形社会障碍。

examination_example.sentence: It <highlight>keeps</highlight> the suspect from hurting others.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它可以防止嫌疑人伤害他人。

examination_example.sentence: lunchtime escape allows her to <highlight>keep</highlight> a boss from tapping her on the shoulder.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 午餐时间的逃避让她可以防止老板拍她的肩膀。

examination_example.sentence: They <highlight>keep</highlight> very much to themselves.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们非常保密。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Keep</highlight> to the sleep schedule.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 遵守睡眠计划。

examination_example.sentence: A long-time neighbor said they never planted trees and only <highlight>kept</highlight> a garden for one year.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一位老邻居说，他们从不种树，只经营了一年的花园。

word_usage.usage: keep + 名词/代词：Let’s keep a seat for him.让我们为他留个座。
keep + 形容词：Keep silent!别出声！Keep cool! 镇静!

keep doing sth.继续（持续）做某事：
My parents keep encouraging me to study hard.
我父母总是鼓励我好好学习。
比较：keep on doing sth. 继续做某事（带有执着的意味）：
Although we felt very tired after a day's work, we kept on working.
尽管我们工作了一天后很累，但我们仍不停地工作着。

keep+宾语+from doing sth.（注意from不能省略）阻止，以免于 （=stop/prevent...from doing sth.）。
The bad weather kept us from going out to play football.
恶劣的天气让我们不能出去踢足球了。
keep+副词：Will the weather keep up? 这种天气会持续下去吗？

使继续处于某种状态，后面可以跟复合结构：
跟带现在分词的复合结构：keep the paper going 把报纸办下去
跟带过去分词的复合结构：Keep us informed of how things are going with you. 一定要让我们了解你的情况。
跟带形容词的复合结构：Keep your clothes clean. 保持你的衣服整洁。
跟带副词或介词短语的复合结构：keep the light on all night 整晚开着灯

exam_freq_info.chinese: (~(on) doing)继续; 重复; 一直
拥有; 保留; 保存

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 管理人；看管者；耐贮藏的食物；值得保留的东西；固定物；保护物；四分卫护球推进打法；监护人；看护人

word_family.mean: v. 拥有；占有；保有；继续处于某情形；保持；抚养；赡养；养活；承兑；兑现；实现；履行；记；定期

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 保持；坚持；跟上；承诺按期付款或做
记日记；写日记；一直记日记
保持平衡；保持均势；保持均衡
保持冷静；沉住气；保持凉爽
保持身形；保持身材；保持体形
保持体型；保持身材；保持健康
继续尝试；继续努力；坚持尝试
保暖；保持温热；保持温暖
继续保持做；不断做；一直做

examination_example.sentence: He worked hard and often <highlight>kept</highlight> the yard clean without any grass.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他工作很努力，经常保持院子干净，没有杂草。

examination_example.sentence: Our monitor Jenny is so organized that she always <highlight>keeps</highlight> things in good order.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们的班长珍妮非常有条理，她总是把事情安排得井然有序。

examination_example.sentence: He needed to <highlight>keep</highlight> in touch with her at all times.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他需要一直和她保持联系。

sense_info_list.en: continue doing something, do something repeatedly
sense_info_list.zh: (~(on) doing)继续; 重复; 一直

examination_example.sentence: The little boy <highlight>kept</highlight> on digging and digging.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 小男孩不停地挖啊挖啊。

examination_example.sentence: President Xi Jinping asks every Chinese to <highlight>keep</highlight> working hard for happy lives.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 习近平主席呼吁每一个中国人要为幸福生活而不断奋斗。

examination_example.sentence: She <highlight>keeps</highlight> improving herself by talking with users.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 她通过与用户交流来不断提升自己。

sense_info_list.zh: 拥有; 保留; 保存

examination_example.sentence: He would much rather <highlight>keep</highlight> time for his hobbies.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他更愿意为自己的爱好留出时间。

examination_example.sentence: You can <highlight>keep</highlight> them for about four weeks in your fridge.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你可以把它们放进冰箱里保存大约四周。

examination_example.sentence: According to the passage, Guo's students can <highlight>keep</highlight> their homework on WeChat, can't they?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 根据文章，郭的学生可以把作业保存在微信上，不是吗？

examination_example.sentence: Food can be <highlight>kept</highlight> for a long time in the north, as it is usually cold and dry there.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 食物在北方可以保存很长时间，因为那里通常寒冷干燥。

sense_info_list.en: to put or store something in a particular place

examination_example.sentence: You should <highlight>keep</highlight> matches and lighters out of their reach.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你应该把火柴和打火机放在他们拿不到的地方。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Keeping</highlight> food properly.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 妥善保存食物。

examination_example.sentence: Many parents <highlight>keep</highlight> a diary of their child's "first words".
examination_example.sentence_trans: 许多家长将孩子的 "第一句话 "记录在日记中。

examination_example.sentence: Recently I've started <highlight>keeping</highlight> a small study diary.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 最近，我开始写简短的学习日记。

examination_example.sentence: Personally, I learn better about myself and my relationships with others by <highlight>keeping</highlight> a diary.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 就我个人而言，我通过写日记来更好地了解自己以及自己与他人的关系。

examination_example.sentence: To be clear, people can't <highlight>keep</highlight> away from all the risks in this way, but it's the best choice.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 说白了，人们不可能通过这种方式远离所有风险，但这是最好的选择。

examination_example.sentence: Grandma loved me so much that I couldn't bear to <highlight>keep</highlight> anything from her.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 奶奶非常爱我，我不忍心对她隐瞒任何事情。

examination_example.sentence: They have special smells which can repel (驱逐) insects and <highlight>keep</highlight> out the cold.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它们有特殊的气味，可以驱虫御寒。

examination_example.sentence: He <highlight>kept</highlight> many animals in his garden.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他在花园里养了很多动物。

examination_example.sentence: My mother worries that <highlight>keeping</highlight> a pet will bring me a lot of trouble.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我妈妈担心养宠物会给我带来很多麻烦。

examination_example.sentence: The debate on whether to <highlight>keep</highlight> pets lasted forty minutes yesterday afternoon.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 昨天下午关于是否养宠物的辩论持续了四十分钟。

examination_example.sentence: Once you make a promise, you must <highlight>keep</highlight> it.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一旦你做出承诺，就必须遵守。

examination_example.sentence: He argued with the rich man, hoping the rich man would <highlight>keep</highlight> his promise.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他和富人争论，希望富人能遵守诺言。

examination_example.sentence: The one who <highlight>keeps</highlight> his word is popular everywhere.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 信守承诺的人在任何地方都很受欢迎。

word_usage.usage: 由keep构成的常用习语一般不用于进行体。

keep from 表示“避免，使不做某事”，主要用于否定句或疑问句。
示例：Nothing can keep me from helping her.
没有什么能阻止我帮助她。

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 最常用词，可指任何情况下的具有，无论是物质的或精神的。
指拥有并保持财产及持有见解等，暗示不让别人拿走或占有。
指具有所有权，尤指因购买、接受赠予等而合法地拥有。
指长时间地保有，保存某物，防止别人占去，强调安全和感情上的依附。
指享有某种权利或长处，带有欣赏或喜爱的情感。
指长时间地保有，保存某物，防止别人占去，强调安全和感情上的依附。
最常用词，可指任何情况下的具有，无论是物质的或精神的。
指拥有并保持财产及持有见解等，暗示不让别人拿走或占有。
指具有所有权，尤指因购买、接受赠予等而合法地拥有。
指享有某种权利或长处，带有欣赏或喜爱的情感。
